hypothesis_content.title: CPI Surprise Amplification with ETF Flow Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: A positive CPI surprise (>0.3% deviation from consensus) will trigger amplified BTC price movement when combined with reversal of daily spot ETF flows from negative to positive within the same trading session, creating a 2-3% overshoot beyond initial reaction.
hypothesis_content.rationale: CPI surprises create immediate knee-jerk reactions, but ETF flow reversals confirm institutional positioning shift. The combination creates amplified moves as algorithmic traders front-run expected institutional rebalancing. Recent $600M liquidations show market is sensitive to macro catalysts.
entry_conditions: CPI release shows >0.3% deviation from consensus (either direction)
BTC 5-minute candle moves >1.5% in direction of surprise within 30 minutes
Spot ETF daily flows reverse from previous day's sign (negative→positive for positive surprise, positive→negative for negative surprise)
Volume surge >150% of 20-day average on the move

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3.5% move from entry price in direction of surprise

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: CPI surprise with ETF flow reversal fails to produce >2% follow-through within 6 hours, or price reverses to pre-CPI levels within same session.
